review: We enjoy this immensely. We used it to replace our PS3 which is having some fits. I didn't want to buy a new PS, but I wanted to watch amazon and netflix. We've taken it on vacation and it is super inexpensive! It gets hot and will stop working if you leave it in the tv. I recommend taking it out when not in use.
author: M. Link

review: Set up was easy and it's really easy to use.  Love it!
author: Kathleen Tettam

review: Setup worked fine, content is a little too old for me
author: Jeffrey A. Bogue

review: It would be better if Dish Network was part of Starz Play and Encore!! Plus the activation site for A&E; doesn't work. C'mon amazon and apps...put all the providers on the lists!!!
author: Amazon Customer

review: Excellent, especially for the kids.  I received everything that was advertised and more.  Well worth the money that was paid.
author: MARCELYN LLOYD

review: ANybody giving this product more than 1 star rating must have it installed right nest to their WiFi unit.  Mine is upstairs right above it and keeps kicking off and losing the network.  Have a Chromecast on same TV works fine, actually a smart DVD player same TV and works fine.  What good is this product if it can't get Internet?  Worthless...
author: Troy Wall

review: It produces excellent images, but it does not allow me to watch most of what I had hoped to see.  Although I have Amazon Prime, that promises lots of "free" programming, it does not work.  Both Prime and the Fire Stick are worth very little.
author: FrPaul

review: My Fire TV Stick is buffering not for a second 15 or 20 minutes a day.  If not that it freezes alot.
author: Elizabeth  Garrett
